Game.Name: Power League '93 (Japan)
Game.plot: Power League '93 is a Sports game, published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 1993.Cheat: Extra TeamsAt the team selection screen, hold run and press I to access an extra team. After that, hold select and press I to access another extra team.Cheat: Extra TeamsAt the stadium selection screen, hold run and press select to unlock a hidden stadium.Cheat: Extra TeamsAt any mode except the Pennant mode, hold II + Select and move the directional pad to be able to choose the same team as the opponent.
Game.Notes: Power League '93 is a baseball game from Hudson Entertainment and is the sixth game in their Power League series, which began as part of the Power Sports franchise, and the seventh game in the series overall - the first Super Famicom game, Super Power League, was released a few months earlier. After Power League '93, Hudson would continue to focus on creating Super Famicom entries. The game includes numerous gameplay tweaks to Power League V's model, retaining the new graphics style. The game is a little more challenging as a result of addressing difficulty balances.
